resources.string:
aWallet tidak dapat terhubung ke Google Play. Versi Google Play Anda mungkin versi yang lama. Anda dapat melanjutkan menggunakan aWallet tapi Anda tida dapat melakukan upgrade untuk mendapat semua fitur.

Fitur-fitur berikut ditiadakan:
%s

The Google Play billing service is not available at this time. You can continue to use this app but you won't be able to make purchases.

Following features are disabled:
%s
Upgrade to get all features forever:\n\n%s
Any other app on your phone can read from Clipboard!
There is header column with empty text in:\n%s
There is row with first empty column in \'%s\'.
Will import %d CSV files� No data will be lost.

Will import %1$d CSV files�

%2$s containing %3$s will be overwritten!!!

Be sure to have data backup for the case you lose some or all data.
All rows of \'%1$s\' must have %2$d columns (the same number as the header). There is row with %3$d columns.
Maximum number of categories is %1$d.\nFile \'%2$s\' contains %3$d categories.
Maximum number of entries is %1$d.\nFile \'%2$s\' contains %3$d entries.
Maximum number of fields is %1$d.\nFile \'%2$s\' contains %3$d fields.
Maximum length of field name is %1$d.\nFile \'%2$s\' contains field name with length %3$d.
Maximum length of field value is %1$d.\nFile \'%2$s\' contains value with length %3$d.
There is no CSV header in:\n%s
There are no CSV files in:\n%s
- CSV Import\n- Password Generator\n- and also all Pro features added in future aWallet versions
